verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Muth-labben. A Psalm of David. I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>; I will show <S%H5608>forth<s%> all thy marvellous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
I will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5970>exult<s%> in <S%H2167>thee<s%>; I will sing praise to thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O thou Most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
When mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>, They <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and <S%H6>perish<s%> at thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>.
For thou hast <S%H6213>maintained<s%> my <S%H4941>right<s%> and my <S%H1779>cause<s%>; Thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> in the <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H8199>judging<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, thou hast <S%H6>destroyed<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; Thou hast blotted <S%H4229>out<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

The <S%H341>enemy<s%> are come to an <S%H8552>end<s%>, they are <S%H2723>desolate<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>; And the <S%H6145>cities<s%> which thou hast <S%H5428>overthrown<s%>, The very <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of <S%H1992>them<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%>.
But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> as king for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: He hath <S%H3559>prepared<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>;
And he will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, He will minister <S%H1777>judgment<s%> to the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> in <S%H4339>uprightness<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> also will be a high <S%H4869>tower<s%> for the <S%H1790>oppressed<s%>, A high <S%H4869>tower<s%> in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>;
And they that <S%H3045>know<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> will put their <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>thee<s%>; For thou, Jehovah, hast not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> them that seek <S%H1875>thee<s%>.
Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: <S%H5046>Declare<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%>.
For he that maketh <S%H1875>inquisition<s%> for <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H2142>remembereth<s%> <S%H7911>them<s%>; He forgetteth not the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H6035>poor<s%>.

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah; <S%H7200>Behold<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> which I suffer of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7311>me<s%>, Thou that liftest me up from the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>;
That I may show <S%H5608>forth<s%> all thy <S%H8416>praise<s%>. In the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> are sunk <S%H2883>down<s%> in the <S%H7845>pit<s%> that they <S%H6213>made<s%>: In the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> they <S%H2934>hid<s%> is their own <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H3920>taken<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made himself <S%H3045>known<s%>, he hath <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>: The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5367>snared<s%> in the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his own <S%H3709>hands<s%>. <S%H1902>[Higgaion<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>]
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%> back unto <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, Even all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7913>forget<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
For the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall not <S%H5331>alway<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>, Nor the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; Let not <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H5810>prevail<s%>: Let the <S%H1471>nations<s%> be <S%H8199>judged<s%> in thy <S%H6440>sight<s%>.
Put <S%H7896><s%> them in <S%H4172>fear<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Let the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> themselves to be but <S%H582>men<s%>. <S%H5542>[Selah<s%>]
